### Marking key    
**Page 1. Title and Summary  5%**    
Grading  
Clear title   
Summary compelling, simple, & plain language (< 1800 words)  


**Page 2. Research proposal 10%**     
Grading  
The research proposal - ONE page only - just like Canadian Government rules. 
Background info & Objectives  
Hypothesis  
Outline of experimental design approach-theoretical  
Methods  
Significance 

**Page 3.  Literature cited  5%**    
Grading  
At least 5 studies published within last 5 years cited.
